name: SlackPoster
author: Louis G.
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: UserName
inputs.label: Message Author
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will be displayed in Slack as the message author.

inputs.name: ApiToken
inputs.label: Slack Api Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Slack Api token. Should be stored in a secure build variable.

inputs.name: Channel
inputs.label: Channel (or user display name)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The channel or user where to post the message. (ex. #general, #random, @johndoe)

inputs.name: IconUrl
inputs.label: Icon Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: The icon that will be displayed in front of the message. (ideally 128x128 px)

inputs.name: NeverFails
inputs.label: Never fails
inputs.helpMarkDown: Wether or not the task should fail if the message cannot be sent.
